content.title: Indian Agricultural Research Institute - Scholarship
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.details: The Awards shall be made by the Dean and Joint Director (Education) of the Institute on the advice of the 'Standing Committee on Scholarships Financial Assistance and Academic Progress', which shall take into consideration the merit of each applicant based initially on his admission and subsequently on his performance at the Post Graduate School. The normal duration of junior scholarships for M.Sc. course will be two years and that of senior scholarships for Ph.D. course will be three years.
benefits: Contingent grant of ₹ 6,000/- per academic year for M.Sc. students
Contingent grant of ₹ 10,000/- per academic year for Ph.D. students
eligibility: For M.Sc./M.Tech. courses: Candidates must have their Bachelor’s Degree Programmes under 10+2+4 OR 10+2+3 OR 10+1+4 system.
For Ph.D. courses: Candidates must have obtained at least 60% marks OR an Overall Grade Point Average (OGPA) of 7.50 out of 10.00.
Candidates must be of Indian nationality or domiciled in India.
content.application_process: Online application process. Candidates must send a crossed Demand Draft for ₹ 575/- along with a written request for the application form and Information Bulletin.
documents_required: Matriculation (10th) or equivalent certificate and mark sheet
Higher Secondary examination certificate mark sheet, if applicable
Intermediate (12th) examination certificate and mark sheet, if applicable
Bachelor’s degree certificate and mark sheet
Master’s degree certificate and mark sheet

faqs.question: What is this scheme?
faqs.answer: The Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI) Junior and Senior Scholarship shall be awarded to M.Sc. and Ph.D. students admitted under General Open Competition Scheme.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the IARI scholarship?
How much amount will be provided under financial benefits?
faqs.answer: The value of the M.Sc. and Ph.D. scholarship will be ₹ 7,560/- and ₹10,500/- per month, respectively.

faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria For the M.Sc./M.Tech?
faqs.answer: Candidates who had their Bachelor’s Degree Programmes under 10+2+4 OR 10+2+3 OR 10+1+4 system are eligible to apply.

faqs.question: What is the age limit for the Ph.D. Candidates?
faqs.answer: The minimum age limit for admission to Ph.D. shall be 21 years.
